title: Get Ready for the Next Lab!
message: Focus on these fundamental C concepts before you come. You'll be using them a lot:
tasks: Master the syntax of `if`, `if-else`, and `else-if` statements.
Practice writing programs to find the largest of three numbers or to check if a year is a leap year.
Understand the complete structure of a `for` loop: initialization, condition, and increment/decrement.
Write a program to print the multiplication table of a given number using a `for` loop.
